name: HIGGS BOSON DISCOVERY #1 - RESULTS
description:
A series created to mark the discovery of the Higgs-Boson particle by extracting the images associated with the discovery and abstracting them into 3D objects via geometry displacement.

This image is a set of data visualising the detection of the Higgs boson particle by the Atlas and CMS detectors in the Large Hadron Collider at CERN in 2012. The physicists François Englert and Peter Higgs were jointly awarded the Nobel prize in physics in 2013 for their work predicting the particle’s existence.
